title: Using Set_output API
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use the set_output API in Scikit-Learn to configure transformers to output pandas DataFrames. This feature is useful when working with heterogeneous data and pipelines in Scikit-Learn.

meta.title: Using Set_output API in Scikit-Learn
meta.description: Learn how to use the set_output API in Scikit-Learn to configure transformers to output pandas DataFrames.
